title: Cosmos.Ep10.The Edge of Forever.divx
description:
Episode 10: The Edge of Forever

Dr. Sagan leads viewers on awesome trips - to a time when galaxies were
beginning to form, to India to explore the infinite cycles of Hindu 
cosmology, then to show how humans of this century discovered the 
expanding universe and its origin: The Big Bang. He disappears down
a black hole and reappears in New Mexico to show viewers an array of
17 telescopes probing the furthest reaches of space. 

Digitally Remastered
Audio: 6 Channel Stereo (English)
Video: 4:3  640x480 (Divx)
